reviews.text: This monument really attracts your attention when you are walking by Paseo de Gracia.Catalans are fond of culture and they celebrate it in many different ways,this is just one of them

This monument as it’s name suggests is to books. This has got to be one of the oddest subject matter for a sculpture. The sculpture features a half open book, which is laid at a light angle on top of a half sphere. The sculpture was commissioned by the Old Booksellers Guide of Catalonia in 1994 and on the pavement around the sculpture are plaques for distinguished Catalan writers.

An interesting piece of public art and worth a look if you have time.

This sculpture is located at the intersection of Gran Via Les Corts Catalanes and Passeig de Gracia.

The monument was created in 1994 by Joan Brossa and it is conceived as a visual poem.
